name: LinkCustomerToGiftCard
description:
Link a customer to a gift card for future use.

This tool is used to link a specific customer to a gift card, which allows storing the card on file for the customer. Use it when you want to associate a gift card with a customer for tracking and usage purposes.

parameters.name: gift_card_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gift card to link to the customer.

value_schema.description: The ID of the gift card to be linked.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The ID of the customer to link to the gift card. This should be a unique identifier representing the customer in the system.

value_schema.description: The ID of the customer to link to the gift card.
